item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Firstly, apologies for the cliched title. I just couldn’t resist ðŸ˜º. I have lost count of the number of times I have started a blog, only for me to give up on it later. And yet, here I am, trying once again. Well, somebody smart did once say â€” “The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again, but expecting different results.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there ðŸ‘‹ I am Vighnesh Shenoy, and I am a developer from India. I graduated with a double major in Computer Science & Mathematics from BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus in July, 2021. And I am currently working as a software engineer at Microsoft. I used to read a lot of books before college, but I somehow lost the habit.
